parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The type of the event. Valid values:

*   **Warning**: an alert.
*   **Normal**: a normal event.

parameters.name: ObjectKind
parameters.description:
The type of the object. Valid values:

*   **Deployment**: an application.
*   **Pod**: an application instance.
*   **Service**: a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance.
*   **HorizontalPodAutoscaler**: an auto scaling policy.
*   **CloneSet**: an application.

parameters.name: ObjectName
parameters.description: The name of the object. Fuzzy search by prefix is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 0 to 10000.

parameters.name: Reason
parameters.description: The cause of the event. Fuzzy search by prefix is supported.
